title: Make the app responsive on mobile devices

requirements.text: Ensure all screens (Home, Now Playing, Browse Shows, Show Detail, Settings) are fully responsive on small mobile viewports by updating layouts to prevent horizontal overflow, content clipping, and overlapping fixed elements (MiniPlayer and BottomTabNav).

quotes: make the app reactive to mobile devices.

acceptanceCriteria: On common mobile sizes (e.g., 360x640 and iPhone SE), no UI elements overflow off-screen horizontally and there is no horizontal scrolling.
Main screen content remains visible and scrollable without being hidden behind the fixed MiniPlayer and BottomTabNav.
Tap targets remain usable on mobile (no accidental overlaps; key buttons remain reachable).

requirements.text: Adjust global and per-screen spacing to correctly account for safe-area insets and fixed bottom UI (MiniPlayer + BottomTabNav), including bottom padding/margins so primary actions and content are not obscured on devices with notches/home indicators.

quotes: make the app reactive to mobile devices.

acceptanceCriteria: On iOS devices with a home indicator, the BottomTabNav and MiniPlayer are not clipped by the safe area and do not overlap each other.
Primary interactive elements near the bottom of each screen remain fully visible above the fixed bottom UI.

requirements.text: Improve mobile behavior and performance of background rendering by ensuring the global background and screen-specific backgrounds behave correctly on mobile browsers (including iOS Safari), avoiding known issues with fixed backgrounds and ensuring consistent visual appearance during scroll.

quotes: make the app reactive to mobile devices.

acceptanceCriteria: On mobile Safari/Chrome, background rendering does not cause jitter/blank areas while scrolling.
The app maintains a consistent full-viewport background appearance on mobile and desktop.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose existing UI components instead).
Do not modify any frontend files listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (e.g., frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts/x).
nonGoals: Adding new product features unrelated to responsive/mobile behavior.
Backend changes (no new Motoko APIs or state migrations) unless strictly required for mobile UI responsiveness.
